basics.name: Cebajel Tanan
basics.Position: Senior CSE Undergrad at IIT Dharwad
basics.summary: I am a passionate researcher with expertise in machine learning, cybersecurity, and optimization, complemented by academic excellence, diverse extracurricular achievements, and a commitment to innovation and balanced growth.

work.name: Texas Instruments
highlights: Designed a python program which fetched information from Jira, Confluence and Klocwork servers and generated a report to analyze pending issues to be implemented.
Optimized existing scripts used for analyzing issues in the development of projects at Texas Instruments from an average runtime of 8-10 hours to 22-30 minutes.
Received a Pre-Placement Offer (PPO) based on outstanding performance and contributions.

education.institution: Indian Institute of Technology, Dharwad, India

certificates.name: Indo-Finnish Joint Course Certificate
certificates.issuer: Awarded for delivering a lecture on significance of Game Theory in sustainable development at Indo-Finnish Joint Course 2024.

achievements.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.

extracurricular.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
